common.copy_get_started: Copy the code to get started

banner.title: More than just an accordion
banner.description: Prismium lets you create the most modern accordion with just a couple of clicks, suitable for any design (after all, you can decide how it looks yourself or use predefined themes).

easy_to_use.title: Easy to Use
easy_to_use.description: A simple and intuitive API that allows you to quickly and easily create accordions. You don't have to worry about how it works under the hood, just use it.

available_for.title: Prismium is available for
available_for.description: Prismium is a library that works with any framework that supports Vanilla JS. You can use Prismium with React, Vue, and other frameworks. Simply import the library and use it in your project.

select_you_theme.title: Choose your Prismium style
select_you_theme.description: Or create your own stylish accordion using CSS. Prismium allows you to easily customize the styles of your accordion to match your design. You can use predefined themes or create your own.

animations.title: Use modern animations
animations.description: Additionally, you always have the option to implement custom animations

attention.title: Attention to the details
attention.description:
Control even the smallest details of your application.
Prismium allows you to customize every aspect of your application to make it unique. You can adjust colors, fonts, sizes, margins, animations, icons, and much more.

accessibility.title: Excellent accessibility
accessibility.description: Thanks to modern technologies, Prismium is accessible to all users. Themes for people with visual impairments are available, as well as RTL support.

compatibility.title: Compatibility with all browsers
compatibility.description: Prismium supports all modern browsers and devices. We test Prismium on all popular browsers and devices to ensure it works seamlessly.
compatibility.description_2: Also, you can use Prismium on mobile devices and tablets. Prismium adapts to any screen size and resolution to provide the best experience with your application.

use_prismium.title: Use Prismium in unexpected places
use_prismium.description: With Prismium, you can create not only regular accordions but also many other UI elements. For example, you can use it to create filters, comparisons, cards, etc.
